tests.name: Application Startup
tests.description: The application starts successfully without errors
tests.details: The Python process was successfully launched and remained stable throughout the analysis period. No startup errors were detected.

tests.name: Process Stability
tests.description: Application maintains stable execution over time
tests.details: The application ran continuously for 120 seconds without crashes or unexpected termination. Memory usage remained consistent.

tests.name: Module Dependencies
tests.description: All required modules (pygame, sys, random, enum) are available
tests.details: No import errors were observed. The pygame library is properly installed and initialized.

tests.name: Code Structure
tests.description: Game follows proper object-oriented design patterns
tests.details: Classes (Enemy, Player, Game) are well-structured with proper initialization, update loops, and drawing methods. KickState enum provides clear state management.

tests.name: Game Mechanics
tests.details: Enemy spawning from left/right, player kicking mechanics, collision detection, scoring system (+100 points per enemy), lives system (3 lives), game over state, and pause functionality are all implemented.

tests.name: Input Handling
tests.description: Keyboard input handling is properly implemented
tests.details: Arrow keys for kicking (LEFT/RIGHT), P for pause, ESC to quit, SPACE to restart after game over.

tests.name: Display System
tests.details: Screen setup uses 800x600 resolution as specified in appinfo.json. UI elements include score display, lives indicators, timer, and control instructions.

tests.name: Timing System
tests.description: Frame rate control and game timing
tests.details: 60 FPS target with clock.tick(60). Game time tracking, spawn intervals that decrease over time (difficulty progression), kick durations, and recovery frames are all properly timed.

observations: The game is a 2D side-view martial arts action game with simple vector-style graphics
Player character (green rectangle) is positioned in the center of the screen
Enemies (red rectangles) approach from both left and right sides at varying speeds
Kick mechanic includes wind-up animation with leg extension and recovery frames
Difficulty increases over time as spawn frequency increases and enemy speeds increase
Visual feedback includes color changes during different states (idle, kicking, recovery)
Game includes comprehensive UI: score, lives (as red circles), timer, controls help
Proper game states: playing, paused, game over with restart option
recommendations: Consider adding sound effects for kicks and enemy defeats
Could add visual particle effects when enemies are defeated
Consider adding a high score system
Could benefit from more varied enemy types or attack patterns
command_to_stop: taskkill /F /IM python.exe (Windows) or kill -9 $(pgrep -f 'uv run main.py') (Unix)
